trans-unit.source: In case of exceptional problems you might want to restore an older version of Workflow Accelerator. Be aware, if you revert Workflow Accelerator to an older version, it is not guaranteed that you can keep on using your current database. The upgrade to a newer version can involve schema changes that render the database incompatible with older versions of Workflow Accelerator. In this situation, the Workflow Accelerator system will not start if it detects a newer version of the database schema which it doesn't support. This is the reason why you should create a backup before updating the system.

seg-source.mrk: In case of exceptional problems you might want to restore an older version of Workflow Accelerator.
Be aware, if you revert Workflow Accelerator to an older version, it is not guaranteed that you can keep on using your current database.
The upgrade to a newer version can involve schema changes that render the database incompatible with older versions of Workflow Accelerator.
In this situation, the Workflow Accelerator system will not start if it detects a newer version of the database schema which it doesn't support.
This is the reason why you should create a backup before updating the system.

target.mrk: Im Falle eines außergewöhnlichen Fehlers kann es notwendig sein, das System wieder auf eine ältere Version von Workflow Accelerator zurückzusetzen.
Seien Sie sich bewusst, dass es keine Garantie gibt, dass Sie eine ältere Version von Workflow Accelerator mit der aktuellen Datenbank betreiben können.

Die Aktualisierung von Workflow Accelerator auf eine neuere Version kann Änderungen im Datenbankschema nach sich ziehen, die wiederum die Datenbank inkompatibel zu älteren Versionen von Workflow Accelerator machen.
In dieser Situation wird das Workflow Accelerator-System nicht starten, wenn es eine neuere Datenbankversion als die vom System unterstützte Version erkennt.
Aus diesem Grund sollten Sie vor jeder Aktualisierung ein Backup der Datenbank anlegen.

trans-unit.source: In order to restore an older version, you can follow the instructions in this chapter again. However, instead of creating a backup you should restore an older backup.

seg-source.mrk: In order to restore an older version, you can follow the instructions in this chapter again.
However, instead of creating a backup you should restore an older backup.

target.mrk: Um eine ältere Version wieder herzustellen, können Sie den Anweisungen in diesem Kapitel folgen.
Statt ein Backup anzulegen, müssen Sie nun ein zuvor erstelltes Backup wiederherstellen.

trans-unit.source: Unpack the older version of Workflow Accelerator, see <MadCap:xref href="../install/unpack.htm#top" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Unpack Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Unpack the older version of Workflow Accelerator, see <MadCap:xref href="../install/unpack.htm#top" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Unpack Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Entpacken Sie die ältere Version von Workflow Accelerator, vgl. <MadCap:xref href="../install/unpack.htm#top" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Unpack Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Stop the Workflow Accelerator system, see <MadCap:xref href="../stop/stop.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Stopping Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Stop the Workflow Accelerator system, see <MadCap:xref href="../stop/stop.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Stopping Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Stoppen Sie das Workflow Accelerator-System, vgl. <MadCap:xref href="../stop/stop.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Stopping Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Restore an earlier back up that was taken while the old Workflow Accelerator version was deployed. See <MadCap:xref href="../restore-backups/restore-backups.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Restoring backups </MadCap:xref> for more information on how to restore a backup.

seg-source.mrk: Restore an earlier back up that was taken while the old Workflow Accelerator version was deployed.

See <MadCap:xref href="../restore-backups/restore-backups.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Restoring backups </MadCap:xref> for more information on how to restore a backup.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie nun ein Backup der Datenbank wieder her, welches erstellt wurde, während die alte Workflow Accelerator-Version installiert war.

In Kapitel <MadCap:xref href="../restore-backups/restore-backups.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Restoring backups </MadCap:xref> finden Sie mehr Informationen dazu, wie Sie ein Backup anlegen.

trans-unit.source: Backup the configuration files, see <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Backup the configuration files, see <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Sichern Sie die Konfigurationsdateien, vgl. <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Install the older version of the webapp in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd>, see <MadCap:xref href="install-new-version.htm#Inst" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Install a new version </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Install the older version of the mail relay in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>, see <MadCap:xref href="install-new-version.htm#Inst" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Install a new version </MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Install the older version of the mail relay in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>, see <MadCap:xref href="install-new-version.htm#Inst" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Install a new version </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Check the configuration files again, see <MadCap:xref href="revisit-configuration-files.htm#Revi" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Revisit the configuration files </MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Check the configuration files again, see <MadCap:xref href="revisit-configuration-files.htm#Revi" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Revisit the configuration files </MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Überprüfen Sie die Konfigurationsdateien erneut, vgl. <MadCap:xref href="revisit-configuration-files.htm#Revi" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Revisit the configuration files </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Start the Workflow Accelerator system, see <MadCap:xref href="../start/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Starting Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Start the Workflow Accelerator system, see <MadCap:xref href="../start/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Starting Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Starten Sie das Workflow Accelerator-System, vgl. <MadCap:xref href="../start/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Starting Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Now, the Workflow Accelerator system should be running with the older version again.

seg-source.mrk: Now, the Workflow Accelerator system should be running with the older version again.

target.mrk: Jetzt sollte das Workflow Accelerator-System wieder mit der alten Version laufen.
